page.title: 14Children's Games Birdingbury
page.content: {Tig Shadow.}A game we like to play is one that is only for a sunny day.The person who is "it" has to jump on the shadows of all the other children.When they are all out we choose another person to be "it".{Spider and Fly.}We play this on the school climbing frame.The spider has to swing around the outside of the frame making an imaginary web.As he makes the web he has to touch each of the others and they are caught in the web.The game is over when all the children have been caught.{Children's Customs.}When we want to come out of a game for a short time to do something we cross our fingers and use the word "nigses".This means no_one can get us until we uncross our fingers.{Good Luck,Bad {Luck.}For good luck we catch a leaf when it is falling.We have bad luck if we open crisp packets upside down.
